column5: Some of you know thtat I am a volunteer at the fishway we need a new counter and there is a contest for 25k on wfn  if you are on Facebook or email please go and vote for the town  we could use the money to replace our 26 year old counter  please vote and vote again and again Thank you  http://www.worldfishingnetwork.com/uft/vote/porthope-on
